summary: Created comprehensive frontend detailed report documenting all functions, features, components, services, and architecture of the Stock Verification System React Native application. The report includes: Technology stack (React Native 0.81.5, Expo Router, TypeScript), 30+ screens across 3 user roles (Staff, Supervisor, Admin), 60+ reusable components, 33 service modules, 29+ core functions, 50+ API endpoints, offline-first architecture, barcode scanning (12+ formats), stock counting workflow, session management, analytics, export functionality, sync & conflict resolution, security features, and performance optimizations.
current_status: Frontend detailed report has been analyzed and documented. The report covers all major aspects including architecture, features, components, services, APIs, state management, navigation, functions, offline capabilities, performance optimizations, security, and development tools. The application is a comprehensive React Native solution with offline-first architecture supporting iOS, Android, and Web platforms.
